entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
WIDESPREAD DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY DENSE FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE MORNING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
